metadata.title: CVE-2016-2347 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
Integer underflow in the decode_level3_header function in lib/lha_file_header.c in Lhasa before 0.3.1 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted archive.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2016-2347` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

lhasa - 0.3.1-1
liblhasa0 - 0.3.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: lhasa package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.3.1-1').
